text: Kya unhon ne dekha nahin ke unse pehle kitni aisi qaumom ko hum halaak kar chuke hain jinka apne apne zamane mein doar dora raha hai? Unko humne zameen mein woh iqtedar baksha tha jo tumhein nahin baksha hai. Unpar humne aasman se khoob baarishein barsayi aur unke nichey nehrein baha di, (magar jab unhon ne kufraan e niyamat kiya to) aakhir e kaar humne unke gunahon ki padash mein unhein tabaah kardiya aur unki jagah dusre daur ki qaumon ko uthaya
